title: did not get rp from tournament
body: yo so we won nightgamers and all my team mates got the rp but i did not (proof that i have registered http://prntscr.com/g8j03e)

replies.body: You may need to first try reaching out to the people who held the tournament to let them know something might have gone wrong with the prize distribution. After that, go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if they're unwilling to help with any and all documentation you may have.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EX8nff42,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-15T03:41:40.616+0000)
>
> You may need to first try reaching out to the people who held the tournament to let them know something might have gone wrong with the prize distribution. After that, go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if they're unwilling to help with any and all documentation you may have.

ok thanks :)
